name: SHOOTER GAL
description:
JUMP AND SHOOT THRU FOUR STAGES!!! GAIN POWERS!!! PEW PEW!!!

Made for GBJam 2018

CONTROLS

XBOX 360 CONTROLS:

X - SHOOT

A - JUMP

START - PAUSE

SELECT - SWAP WEAPONS; UNLOCK FINAL STAGE AT STAGE SELECT (With Weapons)

LEFT/RIGHT: MOVE LEFT/RIGHT

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

X - JUMP

C - SHOOT

SPACE - START (SEE ABOVE)

M - SELECT (SEE ABOVE)

ARROW KEY LEFT/RIGHT: MOVE LEFT/RIGHT

INSTALL: Download, Unzip, Enjoy!

GAME IS P UNBALANCED/UNFAIR, SORRY FOR ANY CRASHES/BUGS/SOFTLOCKS. IT WAS RUSHED FOR JAM.
